title: Misfit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On the first night, do nothing.
- On the second night, you can Confuse a player, causing them to become role-less at the start of the next day. Role-less players lose access to all their abilities and attributes temporarily. Role-less players can visit one player each night just for the hell of it.
- If a role-less player visits someone who has visited them in the past, they will return to their original role with all the stuff they had before they were confused.
- If a player is role-less for two turns, they become an Amnesiac.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only have one confused player at a time.
- After turning a player into an Amnesiac, you lose your abilities and can win in death.
- You can't confuse Peasants

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4437
*There was nobody who wanted to befriend the Misfit after what she did as a child - not until she made them forget.*
